summary: Website for Koda D influencer marketing agency to connect brands with creators, including forms for brands and creators to reach out.
architectural_notes: Project is a website for an influencer marketing agency (Koda D) focused on connecting brands with creators.
Site must provide forms for both creators and brands to submit their details to reach the agency.
Contact section should present direct outreach channels (email and WhatsApp) prominently.

existing_features.title: Create a public marketing website for “Koda D” (influencer marketing agency) that clearly explains the agency’s purpose: connecting brands with creators, helping creators grow, and helping brands grow awareness.
Add two distinct lead-capture forms: one for Brands and one for Creators, so both audiences can reach Koda D through the website.

Define the minimum required fields for each form and implement client-side validation.

Brand form fields (minimum): company/brand name, contact name, email, website/social link, campaign goals, budget range (select), timeline, additional notes.

Creator form fields (minimum): creator name, email, primary platform (select), handle/profile link, niche/category, audience size range (select), location (free text), additional notes.
Connect the frontend forms to the backend submission endpoints using the existing actor/agent pattern, and handle loading + error states.

Add a consistent, creative visual theme for the site (colors, typography, spacing, components) appropriate for a premium influencer marketing agency, and apply it across all pages/sections. Avoid a blue/purple primary palette.
Create basic navigation and page/section structure so users can quickly access: Home, For Brands, For Creators, and Contact/Apply (forms).

Generate and include minimal brand assets as static images for the site: a Koda D wordmark/logo and a homepage hero illustration/background, and render them from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not fetch via backend).

Add a dedicated Contact section that is reachable from the site navigation and includes the agency email and WhatsApp number.

Include these exact contact details in the Contact section:
- Email: dkoda911@gmail.com
- WhatsApp: +1 626-875-4603

The Contact section must be accessible via a “Contact” option in the header navigation and must scroll to the Contact section when clicked (consistent with existing smooth-scroll behavior).
Remove the “Built with … using caffeine.ai” attribution block from the site footer and ensure the footer layout remains visually balanced after removal.

Improve the marketing site content so it feels more real, detailed, and impressive for an influencer marketing agency.

Update/extend the existing marketing sections to add more credibility-oriented content (keep all text in English), such as:
- A clearer services breakdown (for brands and for creators)
- A more detailed process/timeline (what happens after someone applies)
- Social proof placeholders (e.g., testimonial cards and/or “trusted by” logo placeholders) without claiming real brands or numbers
- An FAQ section addressing common questions for brands and creators

Do not remove the existing “How It Works”, “What We Offer”, or the application forms; enhance around them.

Update the footer “Get in Touch” area to include the same agency email and WhatsApp contact details (dkoda911@gmail.com, +1 626-875-4603) so users can contact Koda D without needing to fill the application forms.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create Koda D marketing website with lead capture forms for brands and creators to contact/apply
Implement backend endpoints to receive and persist Brand and Creator form submissions in the single Motoko actor, including timestamps and a submission type (brand/creator).
Update Contact option to include agency email (dkoda911@gmail.com) and WhatsApp number (+1 626-875-4603)
Remove “build by caffeine ai” text from site footer
Improve site realism and credibility with more detailed agency website content and more impressive presentation (e.g., services, process, social proof, FAQs)
